text: cng raluk khna thi xallxhˌ thrng hı cea hen phwk khea mi canwn nxy kwa nı khwam fan khxng cea læa hakwa phraxngkh thrng hı cea hen phwk khea mi canwn mak læw sir nænxn phwk cea k yxm yxthx kan læa khadyæng kan nı kickar nan tæthwa xallxhˌ di thrng hı plxdphay khun thæcring phraxngkh nan khux phuthrng rxbru sing sung xyu nı thrwngxk
